USER_END_IP = #{userEndIp},
USER_IP_DESC = #{userIpDesc},

MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},

EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},

ext_num2 = #{extNum2},

where ID = #{id}
